title: Bouquet Collection: 6-card luxury grid with updated pricing, descriptions, and premium soft-white images

requirements.summary: Refactor /bouquets to a single “Bouquet Collection” section that renders exactly 6 premium product cards, each with image, name, short description, and pricing details.
acceptanceCriteria: /bouquets renders one Bouquet Collection section containing 6 product cards for: Ribbon Flower Bouquet, Artificial Flower Bouquet, Natural Flower Bouquet, Pipe Cleaner Flower Bouquet, Polaroid Bouquet, Customized Bouquet.
Each card displays: image, name, short description, and pricing details (tiers or starting price as specified).
Text and pricing match the user prompt exactly (including the Pipe Cleaner note text).

file_operations.description: Replace the current split layout (3-card grid + separate Pipe Cleaner feature card) with a single main Section titled “Bouquet Collection” that contains a responsive grid rendering exactly 6 cards. Each card must show the assigned image, bouquet name, the exact short description for that bouquet, and the correct pricing details (tier list or “Starting from” line as required). Use shadcn-ui Card/Badge (and any existing UI primitives already imported) to keep a clean, premium card presentation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Update bouquet product copy so all 6 cards match the provided descriptions and pricing exactly, including the Pipe Cleaner customization note.
acceptanceCriteria: Prices displayed on the Bouquet Collection page match the prompt exactly (including ₹200/₹250/₹300+ for Pipe Cleaner, and Starting from ₹350/₹550 for Polaroid/Customized).
The Pipe Cleaner card includes the note text exactly: “Final price depends on customization.”
Each bouquet card includes its specific short description (not generic placeholder text like “Choose your preferred tier”).

file_operations.description: Update the data rendered by the 6 bouquet cards to match the prompt exactly: (1) Ribbon: desc “Handmade ribbon flower bouquet with elegant wrapping.” tiers Normal ₹89, Premium ₹119; (2) Artificial: desc “Long-lasting artificial flower bouquet with premium finish.” tiers Normal ₹89, Premium ₹119; (3) Natural: desc “Fresh natural flower bouquet arranged beautifully.” tiers Normal ₹89, Premium ₹119; (4) Pipe Cleaner: tiers Normal ₹200, Premium ₹250, Customized Premium ₹300+ plus note text exactly “Final price depends on customization.”; (5) Polaroid: desc “Creative bouquet designed using polaroid photo memories.” pricing “Starting from ₹350”; (6) Customized: desc “Fully customized bouquet designed according to theme and customer preferences.” pricing “Starting from ₹550”. Ensure no placeholder descriptions remain. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Apply a responsive, equal-spacing luxury grid style on a soft white/beige background with elegant, premium typography.
acceptanceCriteria: Bouquet Collection section background is soft white/beige (not a colorful gradient).
Grid is responsive (1 column on small screens; increases with breakpoints) and maintains equal spacing between cards.
Card styling reads as premium (clean borders/shadows, consistent spacing/typography).

file_operations.description: Adjust Bouquet Collection section styling to use a soft white/beige aesthetic (e.g., leveraging existing theme tokens like background/secondary/muted) and remove any colorful gradients. Ensure the grid is responsive (1 column on small screens, scaling up across breakpoints) with consistent gap spacing, and ensure card styling is premium (subtle shadow/border, consistent padding, elegant serif headings already used). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
